headline: Teledyne to Deliver Its Multi-Spectral Imaging Systems to NL EASP AIR
summary: TDY is set to ship its UltraFORCE 380X-HDc multi-spectral imaging systems to NL EASP AIR.

headline: US Navy Awards L3Harris Nearly $1 Billion IDIQ Contract
summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., November 25, 2024--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) has received an indefinite delivery, indefinite quantity award from the U.S. Navy, worth up to $999 million, to provide U.S. and coalition forces with resilient communications technology.
